mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role ur on ar.role_id=ur.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_menu_relation rm on ur.id=rm.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_menu m on rm.menu_id=m.id where ar.admin_id=#{adminId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id
